users.about: I am currently at the University of Oxford and have held appointments of various kinds at the World Bank, OECD, Columbia, the University of Hong Kong, and others. I served as an advisor to over 20 governments - including Russia, Turkey, Bulgaria, Macedonia, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Brunei and others.
users.name: bmichael

description: I am a jurist using data to understand and change law. This site provides datasets I use in my analysis.
name: bryane-michael
title: Bryane Michael
